original_text: For those who eat and drink without discerning the body of Christ eat and drink judgment on themselves.
korean_text: 주의 몸을 분별하지 못하고 먹고 마시는 자는 자기의 죄를 먹고 마시는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: For those who eat and drink
without discerning the body of Christ
eat and drink judgment on themselves
